author: Hywel Hosking
comment: Hello, I like this watchface very much. The ambient mode works very well so well in fact that I usually dont use it but it looks cool with this watchface. However there is one minor hiccup, the "clock face" toggle doesnt seem to do anything on my moto 360 v2. It seems to not make a difference in ambient or full power mode.          Update: Dev contacted me after I reported a small issue on moto 360 this has been fixed so as promised I have upped my rating to 5 stars. Good support and good communications.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hi! Look at the screenshot #2 in the play store, on the left watch clock face is displayed.  Or contact us via e-mail: boost.core1@gmail.com and we will privide you all the needed info.

title: I like this very much. But...

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello, David. We are really sorry that you could not install the watch face. As requested, we have sent you a detailed e-mail with all instructions how to install the watch face. Could you please give us a feedback about resolving your issue? It is very important for us. Thanks!

author: Mr Lee
comment: Very nice concept and attractive watch face.  Does exactly what it should do!

author: Jonathan Smith
comment: Looks great in the photo. Once downloaded, it shows installed but not accessible in any way.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! Could you please provide some more info about your watch and phone model  to boost.core1@gmail.com so we can help you?

title: Never showed up in my phone to even use.
